mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECIPE_INFO ( RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{recipeCode}, #{recipeName}, #{recipeQnt}, #{recipeTime}, #{nationCode}, #{foodCode}, SYSDATE, #{recipeIntro}, #{recipeImage}, #{userId} )
INSERT INTO RECIPE_COOKING ( COOKING_ORDER, COOKING_IMAGE, RECIPE_CODE, COOKING_EXPLAN ) VALUES ( #{cookingOrder}, #{cookingImage}, #{recipeCode}, #{cookingExplan} )
INSERT INTO RECIPE_IRDNT ( IRDNT_AMOUNT, IRDNT_NAME, RECIPE_CODE, IRDNT_TYPE_CODE ) VALUES ( #{irdntAmount}, #{irdntName}, #{recipeCode}, #{irdntTypeCode} )
